title: Country finder
about: Search for any country in the world by name or the region they're located in and click on their card to see their details.

title: Dictionary
about: A dictionary with audio functionality to pronounce searched words.

title: Github profile searcher
about: A site to search for github profiles and display follower and following count,user location and user repositories.

title: IP address tracker
about: An IP address tracker that displays the users IP address,ISP,timezone and displays IP location on a rendered map using react-leaflet.

title: Taxas landing page
about: A landing page with simple animations.

title: Language translator
about: A language translator where you can copy text and also play audio of translated text.
